CustomField.description: Type of product line (tier_based, add_on, etc.). Used to process the tier_based product first and then the add_on product after, associated to the tier_based product by the Parent ID.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Type of product line (tier_based, add_on, etc.). Used to process the tier_based product first and then the add_on product after, associated to the tier_based product by the Parent ID.
CustomField.label: Type
